attributes.action: Cancell the proposed pay freeze for all state key workers.
attributes.additional_details: If the Government can find £16,000,000,000 to increase the defence budget by 40% to fund yet another one of Boris Johnson's vanity projects, they can afford to pay these key workers a decent wage.
attributes.background: Parliament should prevent the Government imposing a 3 year pay freeze on the very people who have enabled the country to function during the Pandeminc. They should be rewarded for their outstanding contribution and not given an effective pay cut after inflation is taken into account.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reverse the disgraceful decision to yet again freeze public sector pay: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561208

No public sector pay freezes for the next 5 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320604

Fund an above inflation, respectful pay rise to all public sector workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315198
